# [Interview #403: AOL Chat 2, Entry #32](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=403#32)

#### Question

Are you going to continue writing fantasy after the Wheel of Time and Shipwreck series are over?

#### Robert Jordan

Yes.
